review: Excellent product for this price range. Battery life and connectivity is good. It has minimum bloatware and there is no unwanted applications. Camera quality is good for this price. Sound quality can be little more improved. Eyecare feature seems to be very interesting which reduces our eyestrain and also beneficial to children's eyes when using the mobile. It has overall meet my expectations. Thank you Techno POP 8!!

review_title: POWER PACKED SMARTPHONE FOR ENTRY LEVEL
review:
Design- It is very smooth in look and design. Also the phone size is compact with regular use of hands.

Camera- In this Price range camera is above average. You can take good selfies in daylight as well as Good Artificial Lighting conditions. After that if you use google camera then its super. You can edit your photos easily.

Battery- This phone is just for entry level use. If you are using it in Facebook, whatsapp, YouTube, video call. Then this Phone gives you great battery life like screen on time is approximately 5 to 6 hours.

Charging- The charger is 10 watt which takes approximately 2.5 hours from 0 to 100 percent to complete the charge.

Network- This Unisoc t606 is great to take and receive calls in 4g network. Also this processor provides 4++ carrier aggregation.

Price- Purchased it in Rs. 5012/- with bank discount.
Overall happy to purchase this Great software phone.

I received phone yesterday night

Camera average don't expect much @5850

Touch very smooth and fast

Display is very nice no issue in day light also

Voice is not 400% much louder as told but good and clear voice support

Battery backup is awesome

Sturdy body

Good memory RAM and ROM in this price range

I don't play game so not familiar with game issue

Charging speed is average not so fast but good enough

Value for money product

The best thing is that we are supporting our Indian company tecno

Vocal for local

Hope will see some another super smartphone from tecno to enhance indigenization

review_title: TECNO POP 8 Gravity Black: A 5-Star Marvel of Performance and Features!
review:
Thrilled with my purchase of the TECNO POP 8 Gravity Black! The 8GB RAM and 64GB storage deliver impressive performance and ample space for all my apps and files. The 90Hz Punch Hole Display is a visual delight, providing smooth and vibrant visuals. The 5000mAh battery ensures long-lasting use, and the 10W Type-C charging is a convenient feature.

The dual speakers with DTS offer an immersive audio experience, and the side fingerprint sensor adds an extra layer of security. The Octa-Core Processor delivers snappy performance across applications. Overall, a fantastic device that exceeds expectations. Highly recommend for those looking for a feature-packed and reliable smartphone.

Pros
1) Price
2) Looks
3) Decent processor + 4GB RAM
4) included accessories
5) less bloatware or ads(you can easily uninstall/disable them)
6) Daytime photos and videos are good
7) Dual speaker dts functionality improved after update

Cons
1) charging time very high, more than 2.5 hrs
2) No tap to wake/ sleep feature, so continuous use of power button
3) Memory fusion is a gimmick(The ROM is emmc type not ufs)
4) Night or artificial light photo not good, too much noise

It's a bore phone, it has all sensors but no option to use them. Like gesture to double tap and wake or lock screen is missing, app lock is missing, the dynamic port is active only for notifications else it vanishes. It has custom UI but it needs alot of development. Camera is average, when you zoom the picture tears no clarity. They really need to buckup. These small small features are the aesthetics that customers look for in a phone and surprisingly inspite of all the features there we can't use them. Bore phone, won't recommend. 3 stars for Android T.

Also it's battery life is average, if you are a heavy user you'll have to plug in charger after half day.
Good for daily use but Android Auto not working, need update for that...
